title: Ka thlarau tho la hlim takin
lyrics:
Ka thlarau tho la, hlim takin,
I Chhandamtu fakin zai rawh;
Chawimawina hla saa zaiin,
A hmangaihna a thlawn a ni;
Aw, a hmangaihna a thlawn a ni.

Suala ka tlu chhe tawh hnu hi,
Min hmangaihna a chuai chuang lo;
Min tlan chhuak ta, ka bo hnu hi,
A hmangaihna a ropui e;
Aw, a hmangaihna a ropui e.

Lei, hmelma leh hremhmum pawhin,
Ka kawng min tibuai mah sela,
Him takin ka thlarau a hruai,
A hmangaihna a chak a ni.
Aw, a hmangaihna a chak a ni.
